snippet.title: Sonic Suggests - Full Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is my trash fangame made for Rage 2018 in just one week. Enjoy (or not)
Downloads: https://3di70r.itch.io/sonic-suggests

Tools used:
- Sculpt GL: exceptionally bad looking models (but instrument is quite advanced)
- Mixamo: animations, automatic rigging
- Unity 3D: game engine
- Cinemachine: advanced camera movement and cinematic look
- Post Processing Stack: better graphic effects and higher temperature of your GPU
- Blender: miscellaneous low poly models

Music:
0:05 - Sonic Forces: Sunset Heights
0:26, 7:17 - Sonic Forces: Egg Dragoon Phase 2
0:38 - Sonic Forces: Null Space
1:08 - Sonic 1: Green Hill Zone
1:31 - Sonic Forces: Green Hill Zone
5:26 - Sonic Forces: Egg Dragoon Phase 1
6:48 - Sonic Forces: Death Egg Robot Phase 2
7:18 - Sonic Forces: Egg Dragoon Phase 2
7:25 - Sonic Forces: Theme of Infinite
